      • loadCSVToSQLTable

        public static void loadCSVToSQLTable(java.sql.Connection connection,
                                     char separator,
                                     java.io.InputStream csvFile,
                                     java.lang.String tableName,
                                     boolean truncateBeforeLoad)
                              throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                     java.io.IOException
        Parse CSV file using OpenCSV library and load in given database table. href: http://viralpatel.net/blogs/java-load-csv-file-to-database/. Modified by rammar: https://github.com/BaderLab/pharmacogenomics/blob/master/src/CSVLoader/CSVLoader.java
        Parameters:
        connection - the Connection SQL.
        separator - the Character separator.
        csvFile - Input CSV InputStream
        tableName - Database table name to import data
        truncateBeforeLoad - Truncate the table before inserting new records.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if any error is occurred with the SQL Connection.
        java.io.IOException - if any error is occurred with the file.
